title: Outward bound to adventure
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Outdoor education

description: The Outward Bound School in Malaya. Boys aged between 15 and 25 years are given valuable character training through planned outdoor activities which call primarily for physical fitness, self-reliance, initiative and teamwork. The film shows how Kim Seng, a young Malayan factory worker, benefits from a course at the school.
